note:
I play cello & ”Classical Music” (imprecise term) and drink lots of espresso. I love my cats and I might post about keto diet if I’m feeling sassy. Not much of a Twitter user, but I will work for democracy (irl) and against the oligarchy. Some other languages, too. Deutsch, español, português, български, kicsit magyarul, un peu de français, a smattering of Dansk, čeština, українською, руский, italiano & pǔtōnghuà.
pronouns: he/gurrl is okay talking to me, if you know how to use it!
